headline: Intuit CEO Sasan Goodarzi to Present at the UBS Global Technology and AI Conference
summary: MOUNTAIN VIEW, Calif., November 25, 2025--Intuit Inc. (Nasdaq: INTU), the global financial technology platform that makes Intuit TurboTax, Credit Karma, QuickBooks, and Mailchimp, announced today that Sasan Goodarzi, chief executive officer, will present at the UBS Global Technology and AI Conference on Tuesday, December 2 in Scottsdale, Arizona.

headline: 2 of Wall Street’s Favorite Stocks with Exciting Potential and 1 That Underwhelm
summary: The stocks in this article have caught Wall Street’s attention in a big way, with price targets implying returns above 20%. But investors should take these forecasts with a grain of salt because analysts typically say nice things about companies so their firms can win business in other product lines like M&A advisory.

headline: Intuit Expands SMB MediaLabs Reach via The Trade Desk Partnership
summary: INTU's partnership with The Trade Desk unlocks precise SMB audience targeting using its unique first-party insights.
